```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```



```{r}
loans <- read.csv("ProjectA_Listings2013.csv")
summary(loans)
```


##Linear Regression
```{r}
m1 <- lm(borrower_rate ~ ., data = loans)
summary(m1)
```


##Logistic Regression
```{r}
m2 <- glm(borrower_rate ~ ., data = loans, family = "binomial")
summary(m2)
```
